prompts: Create a legendary fire-type Pokemon with fiery fur and a fierce expression.
Design a majestic creature that roams the mountains, exuding power and confidence.
Imagine a Pokemon that embodies the spirit of a volcano, with molten orange and grey accents.
Show me a quadruped Pokemon that stands proudly with a mane of smoke and flame.
Generate an imposing fire-type beast with a tail that resembles a blazing inferno.
Make a mythical creature with a strong build, perfect for battling in harsh terrains.
Give me a fire Pokemon that looks both intimidating and noble at the same time.
